sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnctsnnmanage ( ctsnn_id , user_id , ctsnn_code , reqst_de , ctsnn_nm , trgter_nm , brthdy , occrrnc_de , relate , rm , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #ctsnnId# , #userId# , #ctsnnCode# , #reqstDe# , #ctsnnNm# , #trgterNm# , #brthdy# , #occrrncDe# , #relate# , #rm# , #sanctnerId# , #confmAt# , #sanctnDt# , #returnResn# , #infrmlSanctnId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnctsnnmanage SET ctsnn_id = #ctsnnId# , user_id = #userId# , ctsnn_code = #ctsnnCode# , reqst_de = #reqstDe# , ctsnn_nm = #ctsnnNm# , trgter_nm = #trgterNm# , brthdy = #brthdy# , occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , relate = #relate# , rm = #rm# , sanctner_id = #sanctnerId# , confm_at = #confmAt# , sanctn_dt = #sanctnDt# , return_resn = #returnResn# , infrml_sanctn_id = #infrmlSanctnId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ctsnn_id = #ctsnnId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnctsnnmanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND ctsnn_id = #ctsnnId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ctsnn_id , user_id , ctsnn_code , reqst_de , ctsnn_nm , trgter_nm , brthdy , occrrnc_de , relate , rm , sanctner_id , confm_at , sanctn_dt , return_resn , infrml_sanctn_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNCTSNNMANAGE WHERE ctsnn_id = #ctsnnId#

SELECT A.CTSNN_ID , A.USER_ID , A.CTSNN_CODE , A.REQST_DE , A.CTSNN_NM , A.TRGTER_NM , A.BRTHDY , A.OCCRRNC_DE , A.RELATE , A.RM , A.SANCTNER_ID , A.CONFM_AT , A.SANCTN_DT , A.RETURN_RESN , A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT CTSNN_ID , USER_ID , CTSNN_CODE , REQST_DE , CTSNN_NM , TRGTER_NM , BRTHDY , OCCRRNC_DE , RELATE , RM , SANCTNER_ID , CONFM_AT , SANCTN_DT , RETURN_RESN , INFRML_SANCTN_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNCTSNNMANAGE WHERE 1=1
CTSNN_ID = #searchKeyword#
USER_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CTSNN_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNCTSNNMANAGE WHERE 1=1
CTSNN_ID = #searchKeyword#
USER_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
